description: Stats panel for Ingate SBCs - for InfluxDB back-end

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 10s)  / 10 FROM "autogen"."cpu_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devname$/ AND "type_instance" = 'steal') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 10s)  / 10 FROM "autogen"."cpu_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devname$/ AND "type_instance" = 'steal') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(none)

panels.description: Shows the current running total for SIP method types received

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "autogen"."ingate_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devname$/ AND "instance" = 'sip-message' AND "type" = 'count' AND "type_instance" = 'ACK-RX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Ingress Method Counters

panels.description: Shows the current running total for SIP method types sent
panels.title: Egress Method Counters

panels.description: Shows the current running total for SIP response classes sent
panels.title: Egress Response Counters

panels.description: Shows the current running total for SIP response classes received
panels.title: Ingress Response Counters

targets.query: SELECT derivative(last("value"), 10s) FROM "ingate_value" WHERE ("instance" = 'sip-message' AND "type_instance" = 'ACK-RX' AND "host" =~ /^$devname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT derivative(sum("value"), 10s) FROM "ingate_tx" WHERE ("instance" = 'sip-message' AND "type_instance" = 'ACK' AND "host" =~ /^$devname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT derivative(last("value"), 10s) FROM "ingate_tx" WHERE ("instance" = 'sip-message' AND "type_instance" = 'CANCEL' AND "host" =~ /^$devname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 10s) FROM "ingate_value" WHERE ("instance" = 'sip-message' AND "type_instance" = 'SUBSCRIBE-TX' AND "host" =~ /^$devname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT derivative(mean("value"), 10s) FROM "ingate_value" WHERE ("instance" = 'sip-message' AND "type_instance" = 'SUBSCRIBE-TX' AND "host" =~ /^$devname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

list.definition: show tag values from cpu_value with key="instance" where "host" =~ /^$devname$/
list.label: CPU
list.name: cpu_value
list.query: show tag values from cpu_value with key="instance" where "host" =~ /^$devname$/

list.definition: show tag values from interface_rx with key="instance" where "host" =~ /^$devname$/
list.label: Interface
list.name: interface
list.query: show tag values from interface_rx with key="instance" where "host" =~ /^$devname$/

title: Ingate SIP stats - InfluxDB based
